verbose_text: The expression of CD fused with uracil phosphoribosyltransferase (CD/UPRT) enhanced the conversion of 5-FC to 5-FU and then to active metabolites that inhibit DNA and RNA synthesis, showing enhanced therapeutic effect with significant bystander effect in adenoviral transduced colon cancer in vivo in mice XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR.
evidence: CD fused with uracil phosphoribosyltransferase (CD/UPRT) enhanced the conversion of 5-FC
